experienceData.description: Development and maintenance of an admin portal (React.JS, Nest.JS, Docker, AWS) and a client-oriented application (Flutter).
Development of a website (Vue.JS) for inventory management, development of a mobile application (Flutter) with the use of sensors (GPS), and a local database (SQLite).

Development of multiple applications (Flutter, Android) for various clients (e.g., Chevrolet, Herbalife) with the use of sensors, internationalization, Room, and Sqflite. Additionally, leading a work team and providing support to colleagues.

Migration of technologies (Java to Kotlin, XML to Jetpack Compose) for an internal package delivery application, as well as the development of new features and the resolution of various unforeseen issues.
Development of a financial web application and a mobile application (Flutter), using Riverpod as a state management solution.
